DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect control whole-body vibration training prevent fall among healthy population people multiple sclerosis .
DOC.brief_title: Vibration Training Preventing Falls Healthy Population Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: For healthy population : Aged 18 75 No known history musculoskeletal , neurological , cardiovascular , pulmonary impairment For people multiple sclerosis Selfreported multiple sclerosis confirm physician No significant relapse within past 8 week To able walk independently length 25 foot Score Patient Determined Disease Step < 7 For healthy population : Subjects use sedative type . For people multiple sclerosis Cognitive impairment
